=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Booty Parlor Kissaholic Aphrodisiac Lip Stain - Love Bite (Berry)
Review Date: 2015/09/01
Store: Booty Parlor
Product Description: ['Kissaholic Aphrodisiac Lip Stain enhances your lips with bold, sexy color that lasts for hours and simply won’t budge, smudge or kiss off! So go in for that smooch with complete kiss confidence - your pretty pout won’t get smudged. Delivered by a sleek click-pen for precise control, the moisture-rich gel formula has an invigorating minty flavor and is infused with a blend of South American aphrodisiacs including Ginkgo Biloba, Ginger, Passion Flower, Damiana and Muira Puama. But use caution - kissing can become extremely addictive! To create flawless lips, use the click-pen applicator to apply the perfect dose of lip stain - start in the center and glide outwards toward the corners. For a high-gloss look with greater color dimension, swipe a complimentary color of our Kissaholic Lip Gloss over your Lip Stain and then add a spritz of Kissaholic Breath Mist for a perfectly kissable pout.']
Average Rating: 2.7
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Booty Parlor', 'Color': 'Love Bite Berry', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Finish Type': 'High-Glossy, Glossy', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 0.7 x 5 inches; 0.48 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'CMC-0027', 'UPC': '885315831514 798813554413 842257001894', 'Manufacturer': 'Booty Parlor, Inc'}

raw_response:
SUMMARY:
The purchase history reveals a consistent preference for cosmetics and personal care products, particularly those that enhance beauty and provide convenience. High ratings, especially for nail products, indicate a strong satisfaction with quality and effectiveness, emphasizing an appreciation for enduring and aesthetic results. Products associated with vibrant colors and longevity seem particularly favored, as evidenced by the ratings and review sentiments.

Themes of practicality and functionality are evident, with purchases including compact or travel-ready items that offer sun protection and ease of use. Price sensitivity appears moderate; while some products reflect a willingness to pay for quality (e.g., high ratings despite varying average scores), others indicate a drive towards value, as demonstrated by the excellent reviews on value-driven items.

Overall, the core preferences suggest a focus on quality and performance in cosmetics, coupled with an inclination towards practicality and good value for money in personal grooming products.

target_interaction.title: These are super easy to apply but they only lasted 2 days ...
target_interaction.text: These are super easy to apply but they only lasted 2 days before peeling off and when they peeled off, they were sticky underneath. I followed the directions and used a very good top coat. I wish they would have lasted longer because they are really cute.
features: The thinnest and most flexible nail appliqué - dry transfer process
Create unlimited manicure styles with just one design
They fit any length, shape or curve without leaving air bubbles or pleats
They are simple to use, fast to apply and last a long time
description: NailHugs are an entirely new and innovative nail art product that is different from nail stickers, wraps or water decals, and leverages a patent-pending transfer process to apply intricate nail designs directly onto the nail surface, like a second skin.
